section-body.paragraph-text: Instruments or devices which are adequate for teaching purposes but have no particular features aimed at facilitating tuition should be classified in the corresponding fields rather than in G09B19/00; for example a black board and chalk don't have intrinsic properties that make them fit for teaching, their respective functions are to serve as a writing support and a writing tool.
